name: Apache HTTP Server full deployment on a single virtual machine - VMware vSphere
description: This template deploys Apache HTTP Server with a full configuration on a Linux virtual machine including virtual host conf and enables SSL support.

metadata.displayName: Apache HTTP Server full deployment on a single virtual machine
metadata.longDescription: This template deploys Apache HTTP Server with a full configuration on a Linux virtual machine including virtual host conf and enables SSL support.

bullets.title: Topology
bullets.description:
1 virtual machine:
httpd service instance with SSL enabled

bullets.title: Usage and Special Notes
bullets.description:
1. The user is responsible for obtaining the appropriate software licenses and downloads prior to template deployment.
2. Detailed system requirements for Apache HTTP Server - http://httpd.apache.org/
